game.name: Tactical Ludo
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The legendary board game "Ludo" returns—more exciting than ever! Heroes with powerful abilities now join the board! Train your characters, manipulate the dice, and create the ultimate team by combining the skills of your four champions! Strategize your moves and seize victory with your wits!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The legendary board game "Ludo" returns—more exciting than ever! Heroes with powerful abilities now join the board! Train your characters, manipulate the dice, and create the ultimate team by combining the skills of your four champions! Strategize your moves and seize victory with your wits!
